meanings.definition: A type of succulent plant with thick, fleshy leaves and colorful flowers.
meanings.sent1: The kalanchoes in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new kalanchoes plant for my desk.
meanings.sent3: The kalanchoes seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a jungle of kalanchoes, bringing life to the space.
meanings.sent5: The kalanchoes' vibrant colors brightened up the room.
